{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3280661,"name":"Niran Schneller","username":"NiranSchneller","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/niranschneller/{size}/212122_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-11T07:43:11.383Z","cooked":"

Hello,
I have looked on Limelight‚Äôs website and haven‚Äôt found any 2024 release for Limelight OS.
Does anyone have an estimation as to when Limelight will release its 2024 version?

Thanks in advance,
Niran Schneller.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-14T22:39:13.430Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1120,"reads":1085,"readers_count":1084,"score":5877.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"Niran Schneller","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/ll3-2024-versiom/452149/5","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"LL3 2024 versiom","clicks":1}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":59907,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3339 Software Lead Alumni"},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/1","custom_user_title":"3339 Software Lead Alumni","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"thinking","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3281856,"name":"mikets","username":"mikets","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mikets/{size}/4625_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T13:37:55.583Z","cooked":"

Yes, I am interested in this as well. Is 2024 LimeLight release required to work with this season‚Äôs game? If 2024 release is out, I will certainly upgrade to it. But in the meantime, can 2023 release at least detect AprilTag (unless it‚Äôs a different AprilTag family)? It doesn‚Äôt seem working. In theory, since 2023 also supports color blob pipeline, there is no reason why I can‚Äôt tune a pipeline to detect the orange ring, right?

@Brandon_Hjelstrom can we get some updates please!

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T13:42:45.644Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":953,"readers_count":952,"score":260.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":8002,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"177 & 429 | #TeamWCP| #TeamThrifty"},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/3","custom_user_title":"177 & 429 | #TeamWCP| #TeamThrifty","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3281891,"name":"Dan Katzuv","username":"dan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/eada6e/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T14:16:05.430Z","cooked":"
mikets:

can 2023 release at least detect AprilTag (unless it‚Äôs a different AprilTag family)?

From reading the Limelight docs it looks like Limelight supports the 36h11 family which is used this year, so I don‚Äôt sea any technical reason it won‚Äôt work. Color detection should also work fine.

I am curious though if a Note model for the ML recognition will be released.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T14:17:00.022Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":906,"readers_count":905,"score":311.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"Dan Katzuv","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://docs.limelightvision.io/docs/docs-limelight/pipeline-apriltag/apriltags#family","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Tracking AprilTags | Limelight Documentation","clicks":37}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32004,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±"},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/4","custom_user_title":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3281940,"name":"Tom","username":"Zook","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zook/{size}/252720_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T15:18:47.498Z","cooked":"
Crescendo AprilTag Map Programming
The following FMAP files works on my limelight. I manually changed the tag type to 36h11. You can copy the text into a text file and save it with a .fmap extension. The field image is old, but all the tags are in the correct spot and tracking. I tested with one of the vision sample images [image]
fmap{ ‚Äúfiducials‚Äù: [ { ‚Äúfamily‚Äù: ‚Äúapriltag3_36h11_classic‚Äù, ‚Äúid‚Äù: 1, ‚Äúsize‚Äù: 165.1, ‚Äútransform‚Äù: [ -0.5, -0.866025, 0, 6.808597, 0.866025, -0.5, 0, -3.859403, 0, 0, 1, 1.355852, 0,‚Ä¶

You can give this unofficial fmap a shot.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T15:18:47.498Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":26,"reads":859,"readers_count":858,"score":306.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"Tom","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/crescendo-apriltag-map/447874/7","internal":true,"reflection":false,"title":"Crescendo AprilTag Map","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":14980,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4276 nice mentor"},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/5","custom_user_title":"4276 nice mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3281960,"name":"Brad","username":"Bmongar","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bmongar/{size}/228654_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T15:41:42.132Z","cooked":"

I feel like limelight is now such an important part of the first ecosystem they should be part of the select vendors who get advanced access. Though Brandon would have to step back from the High Rollers

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T15:41:42.132Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":794,"readers_count":793,"score":213.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"Brad","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":38557,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5126 Codenator / Electrical, CSA, FTAA, Inspector "},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/6","custom_user_title":"5126 Codenator / Electrical, CSA, FTAA, Inspector ","reactions":[{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":5},{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3281983,"name":"Cecilia","username":"ck2928","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/c5a1d2/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T15:55:39.474Z","cooked":"

The limelight is configurable for multiple tag types, sizes, and field layouts so the 2023 images work for the 2024 tags already. On the standard tab you can select 36h11 as the tag type and update the size to 165.1.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T15:55:39.474Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":772,"readers_count":771,"score":174.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"Cecilia","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":13461,"username":"mikets","name":"mikets","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mikets/{size}/4625_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":61038,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3282010,"name":"Jason Daming","username":"jdaming","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jdaming/{size}/137720_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T16:06:24.542Z","cooked":"
Bmongar:

they should be part of the select vendors who get advanced access

People are not given early access to the game to develop new products or refine existing products. A very limited number of vendors are given early and I would imagine often very limited access to specific parts of the game so that they can fulfill an imperative need, not to allow them to better sell products intended to help teams solve a game challenge.

I completely disagree with this. This is an incredibly slippery slope.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":42,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T16:06:24.542Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":758,"readers_count":757,"score":286.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":449411,"topic_slug":"is-there-a-2024-limelight-release","display_username":"Jason Daming","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":18342,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"WPILib Developer (Documentation), CSA"},"post_url":"/t/is-there-a-2024-limelight-release/449411/8","custom_user_title":"WPILib Developer (Documentation), CSA","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3282020,"name":"Jason Daming","username":"jdaming","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jdaming/{size}/137720_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T16:09:59.226Z","cooked":"

Thanks for doing this. Does your fmap also fail to import into the Map Builder Tool couldn‚Äôt tell if I copied or formatted something wrong.

Will try this on an actual Limelight ASAP.

image1920√ó965 73 KB

Pretty sure its under ‚ÄúStandard‚Äù tab.

edit: under tag family in the standard tab. See link below for screenshot showing the option.

docs.limelightvision.io

Tracking AprilTags | Limelight Documentation

AprilTags are tracked using the "tx", "ty", and "ta" values in NetworkTables, just like standard retroreflective targets! No code changes are required to upgrade a retroreflective tracking robot to apriltags.
